content_parts.content:
When a sales order is confirmed, you have the option to generate a proforma invoice before shipping that includes an expiration date. You can track proformas on a tab that displays after at least one is generated.

After generating the proforma PDF, you can download the file and send it to your customer, so they have a preview of the expected billing.

content_parts.title: Unable to repost a stock count, adjustment, or stock issue after adding dimensions

content_parts.content: Stock count, stock adjustment, and stock issue documents can be reposted after adding the dimensions on the Notification history page when the status of these documents is Not recorded.

content_parts.title: With Authorization access control and security options enabled, not possible to generate journal entries

content_parts.content: Enable the Authorization access control to select the new permission to be able to generate journal entries.

The bill of material import has been changed to allow the update of import fields.

Original solution details:
We deliver the ability to use the BOM import template using the update flag (to do that, we introduce the isNaturalKey in the node)

content_parts.title: Non-aborbed variance option for purchasing documents

content_parts.content: On the Company page, you can determine whether journal entry lines are generated for non-absorbed amounts when posting a landed cost purchase invoice, a regular purchase invoice, or a purchase credit memo. When enabled, a stock journal is generated for the amounts that cannot be absorbed into the item's unit cost.

content_parts.title: Tax solutions based on a country not a legislation

content_parts.content: You can define a tax solution based on a selected country instead of a legislation. If your legislation is not delivered with the Sage DMO, you can set up a tax solution to determine and calculate taxes based on a selected country.
